title: about alpha
body: anyone could log into alpha now? i finally got alpha.. after i update, the icon at desktop disappeared... and i found it in riot game floder. but it wont update.. 0/0 always.....

replies.body: Upon opening mine it merged with my legacy client, try opening your legacy client and see what you get. (You can switch from alpha to legacy at any time from the login screen)
I got on alpha cilent a while ago but have  not updatted it for a while and decided to update it today, it just dissapeared after updating.. DId it really merge?? where abouts is this switch button??

Have you tried opening your legacy client?

Once you make it to the login page the switch button will be down the bottom right:
http://i.imgur.com/VrafYPY.png
